data.comment: The first-half is under way at RZD Arena - Lokomotiv Moscow kick-off to start the match.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Grzegorz Krychowiak (Lokomotiv Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 3, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Volgograd.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Murilo Cerqueira (Lokomotiv Moscow) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Volgograd at RZD Arena.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 8, Volgograd have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 11, Sergei Ivanov awards the away team a throw-in.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Volgograd.
Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Volgograd.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Grzegorz Krychowiak (Lokomotiv Moscow) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
In the minute 17, Volgograd have been given a penalty...
Lokomotiv Moscow's Vitali Lisakovich is on target but unsuccessful.
Volgograd are awarded a penalty at RZD Arena. Flamarion takes the kick ... But misses!
In the minute 19, Flamarion is on target to give Volgograd a 0-1 advantage.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Sergei Ivanov signals a throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow, close to Volgograd's area.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Grzegorz Krychowiak gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Volgograd defender.
In Moscow Lokomotiv Moscow attack through Daniil Kulikov. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 22, Volgograd have a goal kick.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Sergei Ivanov waits before resuming play because Zurab Davitashvili for Volgograd is still down.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 26, Play has been interrupted briefly in Moscow to check on Zurab Davitashvili, who is grimacing with pain.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Volgograd's half.
In the minute 28, Goal! Dmitry Rybchinskiy equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Volgograd to take a throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow territory.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Volgograd.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Volgograd will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 35, Sergei Ivanov signals a Volgograd throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Lokomotiv Moscow in Moscow.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow close to the penalty box.
Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Sergey Makarov is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 43, Sergei Ivanov awards Volgograd a goal kick.
Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
Throw-in Volgograd.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
At RZD Arena the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Vedran Corluka gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Vitali Lisakovich (Lokomotiv Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The first-half is over at RZD Arena.
The second half is underway in Moscow - Volgograd with the kick-off.
In the minute 47, Volgograd needs to be cautious. Lokomotiv Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Vitali Lisakovich.
Francois Kamano gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 50, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Cedric Gogoua for Volgograd who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 52, Lokomotiv Moscow's Vitali Lisakovich breaks free at RZD Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Volgograd at RZD Arena.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 53, Lokomotiv Moscow are pushing forward but Dmitrii Zhivoglyadov's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 55, Francois Kamano for Lokomotiv Moscow drives towards goal at RZD Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Daniil Kulikov for Lokomotiv Moscow is whistled offside.
In the minute 56, Andres Ponce (Volgograd) has replaced the possibly injured Cedric Gogoua.
Andres Ponce puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
Great play from Flamarion to set up the goal.
In the minute 59, Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Sergei Ivanov signals a Volgograd throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 63, Fedor Smolov is on a sub for Vitali Lisakovich for Lokomotiv Moscow.
Marko Nikolic is making the team's second substitution at RZD Arena with Anton Miranchuk replacing Francois Kamano.
In the minute 65, Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
Free kick in a good position for Lokomotiv Moscow!
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Ball safe as Lokomotiv Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 71, Vedran Corluka is booked for the home team.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Volgograd at RZD Arena.
Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Volgograd's half?
In the minute 74, The away team have replaced Kamil Mullin with Evgeniy Pesegov. This is the second substitution made today by Aleksandr Khatskevich.
Volgograd make their third substitution with Beka Mikeltadze replacing Sergey Makarov.
Sergei Ivanov signals a throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow, close to Volgograd's area.
Marko Nikolic (Lokomotiv Moscow) is making a third substitution, with Stanislav Magkeev replacing Daniil Kulikov.
In the minute 75, Ze Luis is replacing Dmitry Rybchinskiy for the home team.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Lokomotiv Moscow.
Anton Miranchuk (Lokomotiv Moscow) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 84, Lokomotiv Moscow were awarded a penalty ... Which Anton Miranchuk failed to convert!
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Anton Miranchuk (Lokomotiv Moscow) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Volgograd close to the penalty box.
In the minute 89, Volgograd's Azat Bairyyev has run offside.
Volgograd to take a throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow territory.
Lokomotiv Moscow drive forward but Grzegorz Krychowiak is judged offside.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Volgograd.
7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Moscow.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Throw-in Lokomotiv Moscow.
Anton Miranchuk for Lokomotiv Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sergei Ivanov awards Volgograd a goal kick.
Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Volgograd.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
Grzegorz Krychowiak has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Volgograd's Josip Condric has been booked in Moscow.
Danil Stepanov (Volgograd) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Beka Mikeltadze (Volgograd) has received a first yellow card.
